con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://api-v1.gen.mm.vodafone.com/mminterface/request" xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:head_xsd="http://www.huawei.com.cn/schema/common/v2_1" xmlns:tns="http://api-v1.gen.mm.vodafone.com/mminterface/request" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:req="http://api-v1.gen.mm.vodafone.com/mminterface/request"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://api-v1.gen.mm.vodafone.com/mminterface/request"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.huawei.com.cn/schema/common/v2_1" schemaLocation="parlayx_common_head_types_2_1.xsd"/> <xs:element name="RequestMsg" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ResponseMsg" type="xs:string"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="RequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="RequestMsg" element="tns:RequestMsg"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="ResponseMsg" element="tns:ResponseMsg"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="RequestSOAPHeaderMessage"> <wsdl:part name="RequestSOAPHeader" element="head_xsd:RequestSOAPHeader"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="RequestMgrPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="GenericAPIRequest"> <wsdl:input message="tns:RequestMessage"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:ResponseMessage"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="RequestBinding" type="tns:RequestMgrPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="GenericAPIRequest"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:RequestSOAPHeaderMessage" part="RequestSOAPHeader" use="literal"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="RequestMgrService"> <wsdl:port name="RequestMgrServicePort" binding="tns:RequestBinding"> <soap:address location="http://api-v1.gen.mm.vodafone.com/mminterface/request"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<!--January 5, 2006--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com.cn/schema/common/v2_1" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:parlayx_common_head_xsd="http://www.huawei.com.cn/schema/common/v2_1" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:element name="RequestSOAPHeader" type="parlayx_common_head_xsd:RequestSOAPHeader"/> <xsd:complexType name="RequestSOAPHeader"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="spId" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifier of third party.It's mandatory</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="spPassword" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Encrypted authentication password for partners to access the SAG.It must present if authentication type of 3rd party is SPID+Password or SPID+Password+IP. The value is a character string encrypted from spId + Password + timeStamp by SHA-256. The encryption formula is as follows: spPassword = BASE64(SHA-256(spId + Password + timeStamp))</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="serviceId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifier of service.It must present if 3rd party want to provide differentiated services</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="timeStamp" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Timestamp.It must present if authentication type of 3rd party is SPID+Password or SPID+Password+IP.Format is yyyyMMddHHmmss in UTC time.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
